items.htmlTitle: Match moving - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
items.snippet:
Sometimes referred to as motion tracking or camera solving, match moving is ... 
Match moving, by contrast, is typically a software-based technology, applied after 
the ... is that each feature represents a specific point on the surface of a real 
object. ... In this way features tracked in 2D correspond to real points in a 3D 
space.
